channel.title: theBalancedBriefNLbreakingNews
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from theBalancedBriefNLbreakingNews, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Marijuana shops sue New York after they were allowed to open too close to schools
item.description: A group of marijuana dispensaries in New York have sued the state after cannabis regulators admitted that they accidentally allowed pot shops to open ...

item.title: Judge denies Trump administration request to end a policy protecting immigrant children in custody
item.description: A federal judge has denied the Trump administration's request to end a policy protecting immigrant children in federal custody

item.title: Off-duty NYPD officer fatally shoots man on Staten Island pointing fake gun
item.description: Law enforcement says an off-duty New York Police Department officer fatally shot a man pointing a fake gun at the officer on Staten Island

item.title: US Naval Academy gets first Marine superintendent
item.description: Lt. Gen. Michael Borgschulte has become the first Marine Corps officer to be superintendent of the U.S. Naval Academy in its 180-year history

item.title: Takeaways from the Trump-Putin meeting: No agreement, no questions but lots of pomp
item.description: The much-anticipated summit between U.S. President Donald Trump and Russian leader Vladimir Putin began with a warm welcome a military flyover but end...
